sub_topic: Finding the area of a parallelogram.
message_1: A parallelogram has a base of 8 cm and a height of 12 cm. Find its area.
message_2:
To find the area of a parallelogram, you can use the formula:

Area = base × height

In this case, the base is 8 cm and the height is 12 cm. So, the area of the parallelogram is:

Area = 8 cm × 12 cm = 96 square centimeters
